description: This validates the port channel state by verifying the sync state of all member. ports is 1.
name: validate_L2_port_channel_state

mgmt_ip.description: The management IP address of the target device.

password.description: The login password to connect to the device.

port_channel_id.description: Port channel interface number.For VDX range is <NUMBER:1-6144>. For MLX range is <1-256>, CER/CES range is <1-64>, Avalanche range is <1-64>, Fusion range is <1-512> Cedar/Freedom range is <1-1024>

username.description: The login user name to connect to the device.
